intro: Pycnandra balansae, commonly known as the Balansae pycnandra, is a species of flowering plant native to Madagascar. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of white flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments within the rainforest understorey. The fruit is a small, woody capsule that contains several seeds.
